scripts.dev: npm-run-all clean copy:docs copy:lib copy:binaries parcel:dev
scripts.build: npm-run-all clean copy:docs copy:lib copy:binaries parcel:build
scripts.copy:docs: shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp -r ../docs dist/docs || echo no docs
scripts.copy:lib: shx mkdir -p node_modules/ffvr-esptool && shx cp -r ../lib/* node_modules/ffvr-esptool/ || echo lib not built yet
scripts.copy:binaries: shx test -d public/binaries && shx mkdir -p dist/binaries && shx cp -r public/binaries/* dist/binaries/ || echo no binaries
scripts.clean:dist: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; if (Test-Path 'dist') { try { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'dist' -ErrorAction Stop } catch { Write-Host 'dist busy, retry soft clean'; Get-ChildItem 'dist' -Recurse -Force | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }; exit 0"
scripts.clean:cache: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; if (Test-Path '.parcel-cache') { try { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force '.parcel-cache' -ErrorAction Stop } catch { Write-Host 'cache busy, retry soft clean'; Get-ChildItem '.parcel-cache' -Recurse -Force | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }; exit 0"
